thread.title: vrrusa
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by vrrusa

author: vrrusa
title: vrrusa
text: My father had just passed away & my mother was ill & I had to move fast so I bought a mobile home that had (unbeknownst to me) mold in the kitchen & couldn't get it insured. I did the construction (fully gutting both bathrooms & the kitchen & repiping the whole house) & they wouldnt give me insurance because the house hadnt been insured for over a year! I have pictures of the work & it was all done legally... so now what to do!? Anival knew who to work with and how to get me insurance. I own the place out right and have put about $20K into it and I pay my bills. I was so frustrated and he was amazing! I thank God for him! Thank you!!!
